snippet.title: NO RELOADING: Official Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
🎮 Play the free demo now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1769060/NO_RELOADING/
🙏 Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1769060/NO_RELOADING/
💬 Join the Discord, shape the future! https://discord.gg/AMTKx9R

NO RELOADING is a single-player shooter featuring cinematic bullet-time, crazy tractor-beam limbs, destructible environments, a splash of rogue-lite, and a snarky robot protagonist who has to reassemble itself during its blood-soaked rampage against its captors.

#indiegame #bullettime #matrix
